summary_md: Iceland, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 57,955 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 5.86% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 3.11% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 82.61 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 99.80% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 41.59% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Iceland's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 57,955 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 41.59% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Iceland shows an unemployment rate of 3.11% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable job market.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 99.80% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Iceland has a high level of digital connectivity.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Iceland is 82.61 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's commitment to health and well-being.
